sentences.sentence: The value of Britain increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2013, then it decrease with steady steps by 2016; while Dutch, America and Japan decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2016.

sentences.sentence: The value of Britain increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2013, then it decrease with steady steps by 2016; while Dutch, America and Japan decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2016.
